name: Gluten free Almond Butter Blondies
description: Gluten-free Almond Butter Blondies with Chocolate Chunks and Chocolate Chips. Gluten-Free Blondies Vegan Blonde Brownies. Peanut Butter Blondie. Soy-free Palm oil free Recipe. Makes 1 brownie pan

video.name: Almond Butter Blondies  - Gluten free Vegan
video.description:
Easy Gluten-free Almond Butter Blondies with Chocolate Chunks and Chocolate Chips. Gluten-Free Blondies Vegan Blonde Brownies. Peanut Butter Blondie. Soy-free Palm oil free Recipe. 

Recipe:  http://www.veganricha.com/2016/04/gluten-free-almond-butter-blondies.html

Getting a hang of this. Ignore the stand :)

recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup almond butter  (or peanut butter or other smooth nut butter)
1/2 cup oat flour (use certified gf if needed, or use other flours of choice)
1/2 cup or more vegan chocolate chunks and chips (I add both)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, warm the non dairy milk until hot. Add the rest of the wet ingredients and mix well until smooth. It will take a minute or so for the nut butter to mix in. (Warm the nut butter before adding so it mixes in quicker).
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, warm the non dairy milk until hot. Add the rest of the wet ingredients and mix well until smooth. It will take a minute or so for the nut butter to mix in. (Warm the nut butter before adding so it mixes in quicker).

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl whisk all the dry ingredients. Add to wet and mix in. Fold in the chocolate chunks and chips
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl whisk all the dry ingredients. Add to wet and mix in. Fold in the chocolate chunks and chips

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the batter on parchment lined pan (8 by 8 inch brownie pan). Spread using oiled hands or spatula. Sprinkle some chocolate chips on top and press in (optional).
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the batter on parchment lined pan (8 by 8 inch brownie pan). Spread using oiled hands or spatula. Sprinkle some chocolate chips on top and press in (optional).

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 22 to 24 minutes. (or until a toothpick an inch from the edges comes out almost clean). Cool for 15 mins then remove from the pan. Cool for another few minutes before slicing. Store on the counter for a few days.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 22 to 24 minutes. (or until a toothpick an inch from the edges comes out almost clean). Cool for 15 mins then remove from the pan. Cool for another few minutes before slicing. Store on the counter for a few days.
